content: On today's call, we will be making forward-looking statements, including financial guidance and expectations, including our long-term growth and profitability, forecasts of our fourth quarter and full year of fiscal 2024 and our future expectations of revenues, total ARR, net new ARR, cloud mix, non-GAAP OpEx, non-GAAP operating margin, free cash flow, free cash flow margin and equity burn, as well as trends in our markets and our business, our strategies, and our expectations regarding our business, acquisitions products, technology, customers and demand.
